fraze:t2=wav/split-23.wav,30000,26000
fraze:t3=wav/split-19.wav,20000,26000
macro:start=200
macro:base=100

sub:s1
{
  t2@0,122,3,6,200
  40,42,6,12,100
}

sub:s2
{
  t3@0,22,3,12,100
}

10->s2,48,96,400,,300
26->s1,16,48,400,,50
42->s1,16,48,400,,45
50->s1,16,96,400,,45
# 102->s1,16,192,400,,95
# 10+3*48 48*4=192
334->s2,28,192,400,,220
382->s2,24,384,400,,50

# test:100,20,360,30,11
